meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6216.

td.p: Aleisa Farrington, a mother and cook from Dover, New Hampshire
Joon Pahk, a college physics teacher from Somerville, Massachusetts
Chris Fleitas, a high school college prep counselor from San Francisco, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $82,901)

tr.td: ARTISTS ON FILM
FOR YOUR REFERENCE
BASEBALL NICKNAMES

THE HUMAN BODY
"AL"-X
